verbose_text: Loss of RUNX1 binding at specific sites was directly correlated to RUNX1-ETO expression levels (XREF_FIG A), with some genomic sites presenting total abrogation of RUNX1 binding upon induction of RUNX1-ETO with 10 ng/mL Dox, as exemplified in the RASSF5 locus (XREF_FIG B), thus demonstrating that the two factors are in direct competition.
